controls.name: Account Management
controls.description: Instance has a specific security group: Ensure access control policies are established and implemented.

criteria.description: Instance has a specific security group

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Ensure only authorized transactions and functions are allowed.

criteria.description: Ensure only authorized transactions and functions are allowed

controls.name: Information Flow Enforcement
controls.description: Ensure CUI flow is controlled.

criteria.description: Control the flow of CUI in accordance with approved authorizations.

controls.name: Separation of Duties
controls.description: Ensure duties are separated to reduce the risk of malevolent activity without collusion.

criteria.description: Instance has roles with separate duties

controls.name: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for IAM roles

controls.name: Least Privilege — Privileged Accounts
controls.description: Ensure that privileged accounts are used only for their intended purposes.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for privileged accounts

controls.name: Least Privilege — Privileged Functions
controls.description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions.

criteria.description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions.

controls.name: Limit Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
controls.description: Ensure unsuccessful logon attempts are limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits unsuccessful logon attempts

controls.name: Session Lock with Pattern-Hiding Displays
controls.description: Ensure session lock with pattern-hiding displays is used.

criteria.description: Instance uses session lock with pattern-hiding displays

controls.name: Session Termination
controls.description: Ensure user sessions are terminated automatically after a defined condition.

criteria.description: Instance automatically terminates user sessions after a defined condition

controls.name: Remote Access Control
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are monitored and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance monitors and controls remote access sessions

controls.name: Use of External Systems
controls.description: Ensure connections to external systems are verified and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connections to external systems

controls.name: Event Logging
controls.description: Ensure system audit logs and records are created and retained.

criteria.description: Instance creates and retains system audit logs

controls.name: Audit Record Content
controls.description: Ensure actions of system users can be traced.

criteria.description: Instance traces actions of individual system users

controls.name: Audit Record Generation
controls.description: Retain audit records for a time period consistent with the records retention policy.

criteria.description: Retain audit records for a time period consistent with the records retention policy.

controls.name: Audit Logging Failure
controls.description: Ensure alerts are generated in the event of an audit logging process failure.

criteria.description: Instance alerts in the event of audit logging process failure

controls.name: Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting
controls.description: Correlate audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity.

criteria.description: Instance correlates audit records for investigation

controls.name: Audit Record Reduction and Report Generation
controls.description: Ensure audit reduction and report generation is provided.

criteria.description: Instance provides audit reduction and report generation

controls.name: Time Synchronization
controls.description: Ensure system clocks are synchronized with an authoritative source.

criteria.description: Instance synchronizes system clocks with an authoritative source

controls.name: Protection of Audit Information
controls.description: Ensure audit information is protected from unauthorized access.

criteria.description: Ensure audit information is protected from unauthorized access

controls.name: Baseline Configuration
controls.description: Develop and maintain under configuration control, a current baseline configuration of the system.

criteria.description: Develop and maintain under configuration control, a current baseline configuration of the system.

controls.name: Configuration Settings
controls.description: Establish, document, and implement the following configuration settings for the system that reflect the most restrictive mode consistent with operational requirements: [Assignment: organization-defined configuration settings].

criteria.description: Establish, document, and implement the following configuration settings for the system that reflect the most restrictive mode consistent with operational requirements: [Assignment: organization-defined configuration settings].

controls.name: Least Functionality
controls.description: Configure the system to provide only mission-essential capabilities.

criteria.description: Configure the system to provide only mission-essential capabilities.

controls.name: Authorized Software — Allow by Exception
controls.description: Identify software programs authorized to execute on the system.

criteria.description: Identify software programs authorized to execute on the system.

controls.name: Information Location
controls.description: Identify and document the location of CUI and the system components on which the information is processed and stored.

criteria.description: Identify and document the location of CUI and the system components on which the information is processed and stored.

controls.name: System and Component Configuration for High-Risk Areas
controls.description: Issue systems or system components with the following configurations to individuals traveling to high-risk locations: [Assignment: organization-defined system configurations]. Apply the following security requirements to the systems or components when the individuals return from travel: [Assignment: organization-defined security requirements].

criteria.description: Issue systems or system components with the following configurations to individuals traveling to high-risk locations: [Assignment: organization-defined system configurations]. Apply the following security requirements to the systems or components when the individuals return from travel: [Assignment: organization-defined security requirements].

controls.name: User Identification and Authentication
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate system users, and associate that unique identification with processes acting on behalf of those users. Re-authenticate users when [Assignment: organization-defined circumstances or situations requiring re-authentication].

criteria.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate system users, and associate that unique identification with processes acting on behalf of those users. Re-authenticate users when [Assignment: organization-defined circumstances or situations requiring re-authentication].

controls.name: Device Identification and Authentication
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate [Assignment: organization-defined devices or types of devices] before establishing a system connection.

criteria.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate [Assignment: organization-defined devices or types of devices] before establishing a system connection.

controls.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
controls.description: Use multi-factor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts.

criteria.description: Use multi-factor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts.

controls.name: Replay-Resistant Authentication
controls.description: Implement Replay-Resistant Authentication.

criteria.description: Implement Replay-Resistant Authentication.

controls.name: Identifier Management
controls.description: Receive authorization from organizational personnel or roles to assign an individual, group, role, service, or device identifier.

criteria.description: Receive authorization from organizational personnel or roles to assign an individual, group, role, service, or device identifier.

controls.name: Password Management
controls.description: Enforce a minimum password complexity and change of characters when new passwords are created.

criteria.description: Enforce a minimum password complexity and change of characters when new passwords are created.

controls.name: Authentication Feedback
controls.description: Authentication Feedback.

criteria.description: Authentication Feedback.

controls.name: Authenticator Management
controls.description: Authenticator Management.

criteria.description: Authenticator Management.

controls.name: Incident Handling
controls.description: Implement an incident-handling capability that is consistent with the incident response plan and includes preparation, detection and analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery.

criteria.description: Implement an incident-handling capability that is consistent with the incident response plan and includes preparation, detection and analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery.

controls.name: Incident Monitoring, Reporting, and Response Assistance
controls.description: Track and document system security incidents. Report suspected incidents to the organizational incident response capability within [Assignment: organization-defined time period]. Report incident information to [Assignment: organization-defined authorities]. Provide an incident response support resource that offers advice and assistance to system users on handling and reporting incidents

criteria.description: Track and document system security incidents. Report suspected incidents to the organizational incident response capability within [Assignment: organization-defined time period]. Report incident information to [Assignment: organization-defined authorities]. Provide an incident response support resource that offers advice and assistance to system users on handling and reporting incidents

controls.name: Incident Response Testing
controls.description: Test the effectiveness of the incident response capability [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

criteria.description: Test the effectiveness of the incident response capability [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

controls.name: Maintenance Tools
controls.description:
Approve, control, and monitor the use of system maintenance tools.
Check media with diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before it is used in the system.
Prevent the removal of system maintenance equipment containing CUI by verifying that there is no CUI on the equipment, sanitizing or destroying the equipment, or retaining the equipment within the facility.

criteria.description:
Approve, control, and monitor the use of system maintenance tools.
Check media with diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before it is used in the system.
Prevent the removal of system maintenance equipment containing CUI by verifying that there is no CUI on the equipment, sanitizing or destroying the equipment, or retaining the equipment within the facility.

controls.name: Nonlocal Maintenance
controls.description:
Approve and monitor nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic activities.
Implement multi-factor authentication and replay resistance in the establishment of nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic sessions.
Terminate session and network connections when nonlocal maintenance is completed.

criteria.description:
Approve and monitor nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic activities.
Implement multi-factor authentication and replay resistance in the establishment of nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic sessions.
Terminate session and network connections when nonlocal maintenance is completed.

controls.name: Maintenance Personnel
controls.description:
Establish a process for maintenance personnel authorization.
    Maintain a list of authorized maintenance organizations or personnel.
    Verify that non-escorted personnel who perform maintenance on the system possess the required access authorizations.
    Designate organizational personnel with required access authorizations and technical competence to supervise the maintenance activities of personnel who do not possess the required access authorizations.

criteria.description:
Establish a process for maintenance personnel authorization.
    Maintain a list of authorized maintenance organizations or personnel.
    Verify that non-escorted personnel who perform maintenance on the system possess the required access authorizations.
    Designate organizational personnel with required access authorizations and technical competence to supervise the maintenance activities of personnel who do not possess the required access authorizations.
